step-1.title: Secure
step-1.tip: The PIN is used to verify actions made with your account. It can be a short alphanumeric value that is easy to memorize. If you forget your PIN you can simply recreate your account using the priorly generated passphrase.

step-2.title: Account data
step-2.warning-title: Please store this passphrase in a secure place. This passphrase is needed in order to access your Signum account.
step-2.warning-description: If you lose the passphrase you won't be able to do any transactions, i.e. your coins are lost. The passphrase is not recoverable. Keep this passphrase secret. Everybody who knows the passphrase is de facto the owner of the account.

step-3.title: Activate
step-3.input-label: Write the word 5 of your passphrase
step-3.tip: Please write the word in the given position. By doing so, you confirm that you have kept the passphrase safe. Keep in mind that you won't be able to control your account without the passphrase.

step-passphrase.title: Passphrase
step-passphrase.description: Your passphrase ensures you own your account

activated.account-activated-desc: Now your account is activated, you can make transactions in the Signum network!

imported.account-activated-desc: Now your account is imported, you can use it to make transactions in the Signum network!
